title: Is data entry jobs provided by Digital One India genuine? Is there any other genuine website which provides a higher rate? - Quora

response.answer_text: My honest recommendation would be to shift your niche from Data entry to something else . Precisely for two reasons The competition is extremely high - This is a No brainer and hence anyone and everyone apply for this kind of JobMost of the website as on date are scamming on this .. either they will charge some registration amount or ask you to perform something unrealistic stuff with unrealistic deadline . Both of these are exploitationTo answer your question .. I have no clear idea .. but advisable to stay away from these platforms
